title: President William Jefferson Clinton Birthplace Home National Historic Site: Be A Junior Ranger
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Kids & Youth     Be A Junior Ranger              Be A Junior Ranger           Download a copy of our Jr. Ranger booklet here. You can download a copy and bring it with you if you're plan on visiting us soon, or download a copy and complete it and send it to our site via Wicl_Visitor_Center@nps.gov or our address at 117 S. Hervey St, Hope, AR, 71801. Jr. Rangers receive a certificate and badge upon completion of the activities.   Â      The cover of the Historic Preservation Junior Ranger Activity Book. National Park Service  2016 is a very special year. This year is the 100th anniversary of the National Park Service, and it is the 50th anniversary of the National Historic Preservation Act of 1966.  In addition to our site's Junior Ranger Activity Guide, we also have a Historic Preservation Activity Book. Stop by our site to work on this book, and when finished you get a special Junior Ranger badge!
